short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Introducing an all-in-one application featuring Microsoft Bing and Google Bard, accessible across various webpages
short.da: Præsentation af en alt-i-en-applikation med Microsoft Bing og Google Bard, tilgængelig på forskellige websider.
short.de: Vorstellung einer All-in-One-Anwendung mit Microsoft Bing und Google Bard, zugänglich auf verschiedenen Webseiten.
short.es: Presentando una aplicación todo en uno con Microsoft Bing y Google Bard, accesible en varias páginas web.
short.es_419: Presentando una aplicación todo en uno con Microsoft Bing y Google Bard, accesible en diversas páginas web.
short.fr: Présentation d'une application tout-en-un avec Microsoft Bing et Google Bard, accessible sur différentes pages web.
short.hi: माइक्रोसॉफ्ट बिंग और गूगल बार्ड के साथ एक ऑल-इन-वन एप्लिकेशन पेश करने का परिचय, विभिन्न वेबपेजों पर एक्सेस करने योग्य।
short.it: Presentazione di un'applicazione tutto-in-uno con Microsoft Bing e Google Bard, accessibile su diverse pagine web.
short.ja: Microsoft BingとGoogle Bardを搭載したオールインワンのアプリケーションを紹介します。さまざまなウェブページで利用できます。
short.ko: Microsoft Bing 및 Google Bard를 갖춘 올인원 애플리케이션을 소개합니다. 다양한 웹페이지에서 이용할 수 있습니다.
short.nl: Introduceert een alles-in-één applicatie met Microsoft Bing en Google Bard, toegankelijk op verschillende webpagina's.
short.no: Introduksjon av en alt-i-ett-applikasjon med Microsoft Bing og Google Bard, tilgjengelig på ulike nettsider.
short.pl: Przedstawiamy aplikację wszystko w jednym z Microsoft Bing i Google Bard, dostępną na różnych stronach internetowych.
short.pt_BR: Apresentando um aplicativo completo com Microsoft Bing e Google Bard, acessível em várias páginas da web.
short.pt_PT: Apresentando uma aplicação tudo-em-um com Microsoft Bing e Google Bard, acessível em várias páginas da web.
short.ru: Представляем универсальное приложение с функциями Microsoft Bing и Google Bard, доступное на различных веб-страницах.
short.sv: Presenterar en allt-i-ett-applikation med Microsoft Bing och Google Bard, tillgänglig på olika webbsidor.
short.zh_CN: 介绍一款全功能应用程序，包含Microsoft Bing和Google Bard，可在各种网页上访问。
short.zh_TW: 介紹一個全方位應用程式，搭載Microsoft Bing和Google Bard，可在不同的網頁上存取。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en_AU,en_US,et,fa,f:
Introducing an all-in-one application featuring Microsoft Bing and Google Bard, accessible across various webpages, and designed to conveniently store chat history in a single location.

_______________________________
HOW TO USE 
1) Install this extension and open any webpages
2) Toggle the "Phantom" button on webpage
3) Enter the topic you want to generate

_________________
PRIVACY POLICY
There are no ads, analytics, trackers, or cookies in the ChatGPT Phantom Extension. It also does not collect any user data; the only information shared with the AI model (chat.openai.com) is the prompts and context you provide to generate a response.
long.da,de,en,en_GB,es,es_419,fr,hi,it,ja,ko,:
Are you tired of writing your blog article, news article, or Youtube script? 
Don't worry, you can use this extension to write articles on any topic! 

_______________________________
HOW TO USE 
1) Install this extension and open ChatGPT page
2) Toggle the blue icon to set "Phantom Mode"
3) Enter the topic you want to generate

_________________
PRIVACY POLICY
There are no ads, analytics, trackers, or cookies in the ChatGPT Phantom Extension. It also does not collect any user data; the only information shared with the AI model (chat.openai.com) is the prompts and context you provide to generate a response.
